aggregate_enemies_desc: Não divide os inimigos por tipo; usa uma única entrada para tudo
aggregate_hostages_desc: Agregar todos os reféns em um único item
aggregate_loot_desc: Não divide o loot por tipo; usa uma única entrada para tudo
anti_stealth_grenades_desc: Supressão de arremesso de granadas se estiver em stealth (clique 2x para forçar o arremesso)
assault_phase_chat_info_desc: Mostra a etapa do assault no chat
assault_phase_chat_info_feed_desc: Se você for o host, envia a informação da etapa do assault para todos. (É requirido ativar a opção Mostra a etapa do assault)
auto_laser_desc: Ativa o laser da arma automaticamente
auto_sentry_ap_desc: Configura sua sentry gun mode para o modo AP automaticamente
buy_all_assets_desc: Compra todos os assets que você tiver permissão de adquirir
center_assault_banner_desc: Coloca o assault banner no meio da tela
civilian_color_b_desc: Configura a proporção de cor azul do civil (Max:1.00)
civilian_color_g_desc: Configura a proporção de cor verde do civil (Max:1.00)
civilian_color_r_desc: Configura a proporção de cor vermelha do civil (Max:1.00)
civilian_spot_desc: Você pode spotar um civil no stealth
civilian_spot_voice_desc: Quando você spota um civil, a fala e o movimento é de como estiver spotando um cop
counter_font_size_desc: Ajusta o tamanho da fonte do canto inferior direito do painel do HUD
critical_down_warning_chat_info_desc: Mostra um aviso no chat quando você e sua equipe cairem 3 ou 4 vezes.
critical_down_warning_chat_info_feed_des: Se você for o host, envia um aviso de down critico no chat para todos. (É requerido ativar a opção Mostrar aviso de down critico)
current_hps_timeout_desc: O tempo entre curas para ser adicionado à medição atual (em segundos)
down_warning_chat_info_desc: Mostra um aviso de down no chat quando você e seu colega de time tiver caído.
down_warning_chat_info_feed_desc: Se você for o host, envia um aviso de down no chat para todos. (É requirido ativar a opção Mostrar aviso de down)
ecm_battery_chat_info_desc: Mostrar a bateria do ECM no chat quando estiver abaixo de 5seg.
ecm_battery_chat_info_feed_desc: Se você for o host, envia a informação da bateria do ECM para todos. (É requerido ativar a opção Mostrar bateria do ECM)
enable_buy_all_assets_desc: Transforma o gage package em 'Comprar tudo', na tela de sumário
enable_enhanced_assault_banner_desc: Mostra informações detalhadas sobre o progresso do assault atual
enable_hps_meter_desc: Ativar o medidor de cura por segundo
enable_laser_options_desc: Muda a cor do laser do jogador
enable_laser_options_others_desc: Muda a cor do laser do jogador
enable_laser_options_snipers_desc: Muda a cor do laser do sniper
enable_laser_options_turret_desc: Muda a cor do laser da turret
enable_laser_options_turretm_desc: Muda a cor do laser da turret
enable_laser_options_turretr_desc: Muda a cor do laser da turret
enable_pacified_desc: Ativar um marcador verde para os civis pacíficos
enhanced_assault_count_desc: Show wave count (depends on enhanced assault banner)
enhanced_assault_spawns_desc: Show spawns left (depends on enhanced assault banner)
enhanced_assault_time_desc: Show time left (depends on enhanced assault banner)
equipment_interrupt_desc: Interrupt interaction by inventory key [G], instead of interaction key [F]
hold_to_pick_delay_desc: Delay the time between the hold to pick. Set 0 to pick as fast as you can.
hold_to_pick_desc: You can pick the instant cashes by only pressing [F]
hps_refresh_rate_desc: The time to wait between refreshes (in seconds)
improved_ammo_count_desc: Show total ammo without including clip ammo
inspire_ace_chat_info_desc: Show remaining inspire ace cooldown time
interaction_color_b_desc: Configure ratio of interaction-sec text blue color (Max:1.00)
interaction_color_g_desc: Configure ratio of interaction-sec text green color (Max:1.00)
interaction_color_r_desc: Configure ratio of interaction-sec text red color (Mac:1.00)
interact_time_hint_desc: Show interact time when seeing interactable objects.
lobby_skins_mode_desc: Force enable or disable weapon skins in game lobbies (only visible for you)
loot_screen_skip_desc: Skips the loot screen after X seconds
move_lpi_lobby_box_desc: Moves the Lobby Player Info box to the top center of the screen
new_icon_desc: Use the new icons made for SydneyHUD, Doesn't work for the moment
push_to_interact_desc: No longer need to hold the interaction key [F]
push_to_interact_delay_desc: Start the push to interact from setted time. Set 0 to apply for all interacts.
remove_ads_desc: Removes the announcements and ads from the main menu
remove_answered_pager_contour_desc: Removes the interaction contour on answered pagers
replenished_chat_info_desc: Show replenished in chat when you and your crew are use doctor bag.
replenished_chat_info_feed_desc: If you're host, send replenished chat message to everyone in your crew. (show replenished required)
separate_bagged_loot_desc: Show bagged loot as a separate value
show_armor_timer_desc: Show the time until armor regenerates
show_camera_count_desc: Show number of active cameras on the map. Auto-disabled if heist goes loud (experimental, has some issues)
show_client_ranks_desc: Show team mate ranks in front of the names
show_detection_risk_desc: Show your detection risk or downed count
show_ecm_retrigger_desc: Countdown for own ECM feedback retrigger delay
show_headshot_kills_desc: Kill counter shows the headshot kills
show_heist_time_desc: Show heist time as prefix on all messages
show_hostages_desc: Currently tied civilians and dominated cops
show_hps_current_desc: Shows your current heal per second
show_hps_total_desc: Shows your heal per second of the heist day
show_inspire_timer_desc: Show the time of being inspired
show_interaction_text_desc: Show interaction timer text in front
show_melee_interaction: Show melee charging time as interaction
show_melee_interaction_desc: Show time as interaction when charging melee attack
show_own_rank_desc: Show the own rank in front of the own name
show_pager_count_desc: Shows the number of triggered pagers
show_reload_interaction_desc: Show time as interaction when reloading
show_special_kills_desc: Kill counter shows the special kills
show_text_borders_desc: Show black borders around the interaction/suspicion texts
show_underdog_aced_desc: Displays a flashing yellow glow when the Underdog Aced skill is activated.
skip_black_screen_desc: Skips the black screen at the beginning of a heist
skip_card_picking_desc: Skips the card picking by randomly auto picking one of them
stat_screen_skip_desc: Skips the stat screen after X seconds
swansong_effect_desc: Fullscreen effect when you're in Swan song
sydneyhud_experimental_desc: Experimental features are NOT stable. When you use this, please proceed at your own risk.
sydneyhud_hud_lists_options_desc: Configure lists for timers, drills, ECM's, pagers, bags, hostages, enemies, buffs etc.
sydneyhud_int_locked_pager: Press $BTN_CANCEL to release the pager (triggers alarm)
sydneyhud_language_desc: Choose the language you want to see in SydneyHUD
sydneyhud_reset_desc: Sets all SydneyHUD options back to default
sydneyhud_reset_message:
Are you sure you want to reset all SydneyHUD options?
Note: Restart Required!
tab_font_size_desc: Change font size of tab menu
truncate_name_tags_desc: Truncate clan tags off names and replace them with a small dot
waypoint_color_b_desc: Cofigure ratio of waypoint blue color (Max:1.00)
waypoint_color_g_desc: Cofigure ratio of waypoint green color (Max:1.00)
waypoint_color_r_desc: Cofigure ratio of waypoint red color (Max:1.00)
